comment.body:
Seems no. You would be anonymous like the anonymous in AnonymousHub. :-)
And you wont be seen by people who are too incurious to download your hub.
@Shouko: I think you misunderstood my words. My 2 sentences have nothing to do with each other. :)
@Shouko: Yep, except your Mes with KaffieID just like photos in your home rather than news on newspaper.
@Love is love: 就是你上午新下载的那个
So sad. But it works fine here.
